headline: Valero Energy (VLO): Taking a Fresh Look at Valuation After a Recent Share Price Pullback
summary: Valero Energy (VLO) has been drifting after a strong run this year, and that pause is exactly why it deserves another look, especially with refining margins and fuel demand quietly reshaping expectations. See our latest analysis for Valero Energy. After rallying hard earlier this year, Valero’s share price has cooled off with a 1 month share price return of minus 9 point 8 percent. However, its year to date share price return of 32 point 1 percent and 1 year total shareholder return of 41...
